org.jfree.chart.block
Class AbstractContentBlock

java.lang.Object
  org.jfree.chart.block.AbstractContentBlock
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, Block, ContentBlock, org.jfree.ui.Drawable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AttributedLabelBlock, Axis, BlockContainer, ColorBlock, EmptyBlock, JFreeChart, LabelBlock, LegendGraphic, NestedGrid, Plot, Title, XYPlotWrapper
public abstract class AbstractContentBlock
extends java.lang.Object
implements ContentBlock, java.io.Serializable

A convenience class for creating new classes that implement the ContentBlock interface.

See Also:
Serialized Form

getBackgroundPaint

public java.awt.Paint getBackgroundPaint()
Returns the background paint for the block. This is used to fill the entire background area for the block. To fill only the area inside the block's border, use setInteriorBackgroundPaint(Paint). If the paint is null, the block will appear to be transparent.

Returns:
The background paint (possibly null).

setBackgroundPaint

public void setBackgroundPaint(java.awt.Paint paint)
Sets the background paint for the block.

Parameters:
paint - the paint (null permitted).

getInteriorBackgroundPaint

public java.awt.Paint getInteriorBackgroundPaint()
Returns the interior background paint for the block. This is used to fill the background area inside the block's border (which we call the interior). To fill the entire background area (that is, including the margin area), use setBackgroundPaint(Paint). If the paint is null, the interior of the block will appear to be transparent.

Returns:
The background paint (possibly null).

setInteriorBackgroundPaint

public void setInteriorBackgroundPaint(java.awt.Paint paint)
Sets the interior background paint for the block.

Parameters:
paint - the paint (null permitted).

Deprecated. use the other arrange method.
